name: core_arch::x86::avx512f::_mm512_mul_epu32

convert::Into::into.doc: Converts this type into the (usually inferred) input type.

intrinsics::simd::simd_and.doc:
"And"s vectors elementwise.

 `T` must be a vector of integers.

intrinsics::simd::simd_mul.doc:
Multiplies two simd vectors elementwise.

 `T` must be a vector of integers or floats.

doc:
Multiply the low unsigned 32-bit integers from each packed 64-bit element in a and b, and store the unsigned 64-bit results in dst.

 [Intel's documentation](https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/docs/intrinsics-guide/index.html#text=_mm512_mul_epu32&expand=3916)
